verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
In His presence, (2x)
Get in the presence of the Lord.
Leave thy fleshly mind behind thee,
And get in the presence of the Lord.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Sing His praises, (2x)
Sing the praises of the Lord.
Set thing eyes upon the heavenlies,
And sing the praises of the Lord.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
See the city, (2x)
See the city of the Lord.
Earthly pleasures no longer bind thee,
And see the city of the Lord.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Climb the mountain, (2x)
Climb the holy mount of God.
Leave the valley far below thee,
And climb the holy mount of God.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
Walk in the heavenlies, (2x)
Walk in the heavenlies with the Lord.
Plant thy feet upon Mount Bether,
And walk in the heavenlies with the Lord.
